other_tests.findings: Diagnostic biopsy showed an epidermal inclusion cyst.
Swab culture from lesions on the buttock and shoulder grew out Enterococcus species.

other_tests.changes_over_time: During follow-ups, the acne conglobata stabilized with no dramatic increase in the number of lesions.

other_tests.findings: Dramatic decrease in the size and number of cystic lesions after the 3rd dose.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Continued decrease in the number of lesions and significant improvement of pain symptoms over at least 6 months.
